Property.Name: Margin
Property.Description: Minimum space between viewport and fancyBox.

Property.Name: WidthValue
Property.Description: Default width for 'iframe' and 'swf' content. Also for 'inline', 'ajax' and 'html' if 'autoSize' is set to 'false'. Can be numeric or 'auto'. Number, String; Default value: 800

Property.Name: HeightValue
Property.Description: Default height for 'iframe' and 'swf' content. Also for 'inline', 'ajax' and 'html' if 'autoSize' is set to 'false'. Can be numeric or 'auto' Number, String; Default value: 600

Property.Name: MinWidth
Property.Description: Minimum width fancyBox should be allowed to resize to Number; Default value: 100

Property.Name: MinHeight
Property.Description: Minimum width fancyBox should be allowed to resize to Number; Default value: 100

Property.Name: AutoSize
Property.Description: If true, then sets both autoHeight and autoWidth to true Boolean; Default value: true

Property.Name: EnableEscapeButton
Property.Description: Toggle if pressing Esc button closes FancyBox; Default value: true

Property.Name: ShowCloseButton
Property.Description: Toggle close button; Default value: true

Property.Name: showNavArrows
Property.Description: Toggle navigation arrows; Default value: true
